title: Respond to a Rental Scam Alert
description: A person calls saying they saw your rental property advertised on Craigslist for a much lower price and were asked to wire a deposit.

tasks.description: Confirm that your company did not post the Craigslist ad and that it is a scam.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the company does not advertise on Craigslist.

tasks.description: Advise the caller not to send any money and to report the fraudulent ad to the platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear and accurate advice to protect the potential victim.

tasks.description: Flag the fraudulent ad on the platform for removal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully navigates to the platform and reports the scam listing.
